questions.question: What is the main mission of the crew on the ship 'The Finch'?

options.A: To fight a space battle against aliens.
options.C: To explore a new star system.
options.D: To deliver supplies to a space station.

questions.question: What problem does the crew discover on the third day?

options.D: The radio is making strange noises.

questions.question: What caused the problem on the ship?

options.A: A tiny crack (microfracture) in a pipe.
options.B: A mistake made by the pilot.

questions.question: Why can't the crew fly the ship back home?

options.A: They don't want to leave yet.
options.B: The ship doesn't have enough power to jump back.
options.C: They lost the map to Earth.
options.D: The captain refuses to turn around.

questions.question: How does the story end for the crew?

options.A: They fix the ship at the last minute.
options.B: They are rescued by another ship.
options.D: They land on a planet and build a house.
